title: Exceptions for Anti Virus Applications - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: This document contains the best practices recommended to avoid conflicts with any anti-virus tools. Bypass Netskope Traffic Bypass the following netskope traffic from the anti-virus application: gateway-<tenant-name>.goskope.com: 443 gateway.gslb.goskope.com: 443 Allowlist Folders and Files Allowlist the following folders and files related to Netskope Client in the anti-virus application. ❮ ​ Process / Services / Folder Windows Macos Linux stAgentSvc (Process) C:\Program Files (x86)\Netskope\STAgent NA /opt/netskope/stagent/stAgentSvc stAgentSvcMon (Process) C:\Program Files (x86)\Netskope\STAgent NA NA stAgentApp (Process) NA NA /opt/netskope/stagent/stAgentApp stAgentUI.exe (Process) C:\Program Files (x86)\Netskope\STAgent NA NA stAgentUI NA NA /opt/netskope/stagent/stAgentUI stAgentCli (Process) NA NA /opt/netskope/stagent/stAgentCli nsdiag (Process) C:\Program Files (x86)\Netskope\STAgent /Library/Application\ Support/Netskope/STAgent/nsdiag /opt/netskope/stagent/nsdiag certutil (Process) C:\ProgramData\Netskope\STAgent /Library/Application\ Support/Netskope/STAgent/certutil/certutil /opt/netskope/stagent/certutil installerutil (Process) NA NA /opt/netskope/stagent/installerutil uninstall.sh (File) NA NA /opt/netskope/stagent/uninstall.sh Stadrv6x64.sys (64 bit Driver) C:\Program Files (x86)\Netskope\STAgent\win10 NA NA Stadrv6x32.sys (32 bit driver) C:\Program Files (x86)\Netskope\STAgent\win10 NA NA STAgent (Folder) C:\Program Files (x86)\Netskope\STAgent C:\ProgramData\Netskope\STAgent %APPDATA%\Netskope\STAgent /Library/Application Support/Netskope/STAgent /opt/netskope/stagent Logs (Folder) %ProgramData%\Netskope\stagent\Logs %APPDATA%\Netskope\stagent\Logs /Library/Logs/Netskope ~/Library/Logs/Netskope /opt/netskope/stagent/log ~/.netskope/stagent/logs com.netskope.client.Netskope-Client.NetskopeClientMacAppProxy (Process) NA /Applications/Netskope Client.app/Contents/Library/SystemExtensions/com.netskope.client.Netskope-Client.NetskopeClientMacAppProxy.systemextension/Contents/MacOS/com.netskope.client.Netskope-Client.NetskopeClientMacAppProxy NA nsAuxiliarySvc (Process) NA /Applications/Netskope\ Client.app/Contents/XPCServices/nsAuxiliarySvc NA Netskope Agents (Process) NA /Applications/Netskope\ Client.app /Applications/Remove\ Netskope\ Client.app NA LaunchAgent Plist file (File) NA /Library/LaunchAgents/com.netskope.stagentui.plist NA LauchDaemon Plist file (File) NA /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.netskope.client.auxsvc NA Netskope Endpoint DLP Folder Location C:\ProgramData\netskope\EPDLP /Library/Application Support/Netskope/EPDLP NA Rows per page: ​ 1-20 of 22 ❯ Android and Chromebook Add exception for App ID: com.netskope.netskopeclient . Open IP Addresses and Ports The following IP addresses and ports (Windows and Mac) must be opened for an uninterrupted communication between the UI processes and services. Loopback IP address 127.0.0.1: 57130 Loopback IP address 127.0.0.1: 57140(For EPDLP)
